paper_abstract: We prove that (q (2), 2)-arcs exist in the projective Hjelmslev plane PHG(2, R) over a chain ring R of length 2, order |R| = q (2) and prime characteristic. For odd prime characteristic, our construction solves the maximal arc problem. For characteristic 2, an extension of the above construction yields the lower bound q (2) + 2 on the maximum size of a 2-arc in PHG(2, R). Translating the arcs into codes, we get linear [q (3), 6, q (3) -q (2) -q] codes over for every prime power q > 1 and linear [q (3) + q, 6,q (3) -q (2) -1] codes over for the special case q = 2 (r) . Furthermore, we construct 2-arcs of size (q + 1)(2)/4 in the planes PHG(2, R) over Galois rings R of length 2 and odd characteristic p (2).
paper_title: The existence of maximal (q (2), 2)-arcs in projective Hjelmslev planes over chain rings of length 2 and odd prime characteristic
